lender.name: Mihir

lender.loan_because: blessings are supposed to be shared

lender.name: Candy & Ralph
lender.loan_because: We have many blessings and would like to share. By lending through Kiva, maybe we can help other people have better lives. We also believe in the Jewish teaching of Tikkun Olam, that we should each help repair the world.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: i makes me feel better and it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: i go to a public school.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I believe that people around the world deserve the chance to do great things in their lives.

lender.name: Carrie

lender.occupational_info: I trim horses hooves.

lender.name: biggie
lender.loan_because: To support the dreams of those who don't have the resources. It would be ideal if everyone would be able to pursue their dreams.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I would just spend it on tshirts and marginally useful gadgets

lender.name: VIKRAM
lender.loan_because: Even a small amount can make a big difference.

lender.name: Tian

lender.occupational_info: I'm still a student, studying business at York University.

lender.name: Mr. Edwards
lender.loan_because: Besides the incredible opportunity to help those help themselves, it is much more exciting teaching students real world lessons rather than those found in a textbook!
lender.occupational_info: I teach high school to students aged 15-18

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I have the money to do it

lender.name: EddieStarr
lender.loan_because: I Love
lender.occupational_info:
I work full time, I attend University full time. I am by no means wealthy, though I feel very blessed and honored to be able to share what little extra income I have, to positivly impact another human's life.
(Can I have a hug?)

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: We are all brothers and sisters on mother earth and there is no better purpose to life than helping others.

lender.name: Kallie
lender.loan_because: I think it is the most effective way of making the world a better place. Charity doesn't work. I'd much rather be part of a hand up, than a hand out.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am a Staff accountant working towards getting my chartered accountant designation.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: you matter to me (and thousands of others just like me).

lender.name: Saadat
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: good

lender.name: Luke

lender.occupational_info: I'm learning everything that goes into maintaining and growing a city. I will take graduate classes on everything from basic civil engineering, history, politics and economics.

lender.name: ross

lender.name: Jepa
lender.loan_because: For us the sums are quite small, but they can make someone more independent & proud of their work. Good ideas should not be dumped because of lack of money! I also work as a small enterpreneur, selling just my work, so I know something about financial worries.
lender.occupational_info:
I do massage therapy to help people feel good in their bodies, to alleviate pain.
I also translate books from english to my mother tongue and edit books other people have translated. Because of my work my native language sounds beautiful and is easily understood.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help in some way, even though I can't donate time.
lender.occupational_info: I work on my own in a small newspaper shop one day a week, and study at university most other days.

lender.name: People First Networking
lender.loan_because: "We are action in motion for the cause of those in distress by our generous support for them."
lender.occupational_info:
OUR CREED: People First nurtures people above all else and puts people first through caring, joy, fun and enthusiasm.
o We honor, support, believe in and promote each other. o We are dedicated to the mental, physical and financial well being of ourselves. o We are dedicated to the betterment of ourselves, our members and our future members. o We believe healthy individuals are effective friends, mentors, teachers, and colleagues. o We are action in motion for the cause of those in distress by our generous support for them.

I make sure all instruments are clean, in tune and correctly priced. I mark down older merchandise and damaged merchandise. I also buy in and maintain used equipment that customers bring into the store.

lender.name: mattdotson

They wouldn't be able to do great work for us unless someone had given them a chance to go to school and get a good education. This is our way of ensuring that the children of these entrepreneurs get the same opportunity.

lender.name: Ann

lender.name: Thread Yourself
lender.loan_because: At Thread Yourself we're entrepreneurs in the t-shirt design industry, trying to make a living doing something we love - designing t-shirts. Since we have been able to make a few dollars we're happy to donate a portion to other entrepreneurs as well. Beginning this year, we are donating 5% of our total monthly revenue to entrepreneurs in developing countries through Kiva.

lender.name: Joyful Heart
lender.loan_because: It's my job to!
lender.occupational_info: I sell antiques. It's exciting to stumble upon new things, that are actually very old things, imagine their past, research their histories, then share with others who have a great respect for it. it's my way of preserving history, connecting with the past and looking forward into my future.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: People who didn't know me helped me when I needed help. This is my way to pay it forward. I hope to spread the feeling of gratitude and abundance that I feel every day.
lender.occupational_info: The left-brain side of me is a technical writer and editor who works on technical manuals. The right-brain part of me is an artist who paints on commission -- landscapes, wildlife, and murals. The outside-of-my-brain part (LOL) is the psychic part that does remote viewing, energy healing, and intuitive services.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: it sounds like a good idea

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: An interview with Dambisa Moyo in the NY Times Magazine Feb. 22 2009 led me to the Kiva.org site. Her statement that if you want to help people, microfinance, give people a job.

lender.name: Geoffrey
lender.loan_because: You can't pay anyone back for what has happened to you, so you try to find someone you can pay forward.

lender.occupational_info: Sit in front of a computer and click click click.

lender.name: Donn
lender.loan_because: I want to help others vanquish suffering and pursue happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I work every day for keep my community safe, and to achieve equal rights for lesbian and gay people.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky in my personal and professional life, I want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Dorrel Rhodes
lender.loan_because: I want to help entrepreneurs grow their business.
lender.occupational_info: To provide a source of funds to small business.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have enough food to eat and a safe place to live. I know that even lending a little is an excellent way to empower talented people with limited resources.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct research on economic trends, social inequality and public policy.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I can try to help others as I've been helped in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I have owned a business-to-business delivery & courier service since 1986.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: There is no passion to be found playing small - in settling for a life that is less than the one you are capable of living.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: We are all sisters and brothers.
lender.occupational_info: Teach at a university.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I was inspired to do so by a very special individual! Oh and I believe in helping others!
lender.occupational_info: I am a student, so I sit in a classroom most of the day listening and taking in as much as possible from a group of people around me.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because:
I think everyone deserves the opportunity to grow and improve their own personal circumstances, whether they have nothing or whether they are millionaires already!
Oh, and I believe that what you give, you get back multiplied!

lender.name: Judy
lender.loan_because: To be able to make a difference in a person's life is a wonderful thing.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: it might help.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: I am self-employed - and I know that it means a lot to be a part of a network that helps each other.
lender.occupational_info: I am helping children, young people and adults to find ways to use their ressources and competences.

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I was inspired by Dambisa Moyo's endorsement of Kiva.org in a New York Times interview as a way to truly help the poor in Africa.
lender.occupational_info: I do scientific research in an immunology laboratory of a large academic institution.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because:
I work with local families who need help here in my community. I would like to also help others around the world.
**My first loan was a gift to me from my good friend Shannon, so I could give back**

lender.name: Carlene
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. I am lucky to have a job and other opportunities. I want to share that good luck.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children (12-18) how to write in English.

lender.name: Johna
lender.loan_because: My husband Bob has been enjoying giving through Kiva for over a year, and I want to participate too.
lender.occupational_info: I help people sell their home or property, and also help others to find a home or land to build on. I own my real estate company along with my mother, sister and son, so I understand the small business costs and working to help your family.

lender.name: Oscar
lender.loan_because: Try to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: Help people and small businesses to have a nice professional presence on the Internet.

lender.name: steve
lender.loan_because: i am here to awaken from the illusion of our separateness
lender.occupational_info: i am a teacher and coach by vocation and aspire to be part of the solution of world poverty by avocation

lender.name: Lorra
lender.loan_because: If an industrious person needs a little help and you are in a position to provide it; you should do it in honour of all the people who have helped you find your own path in this world. Hopefully you will inspire recepients to do the same. Kiva gives us the opportunity to help, which is better than a handout, and leave the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I identify where two businesses could make more profit if they work together instead of working independently

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It is so good!
lender.occupational_info: Corp Finance- China

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe in the Kiva dream and that all people can be successful if they have the resources to pursue their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work with organizations that promote better housing and financial stability for families.

lender.name: Carlene
lender.loan_because: I have been very fortunate in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I own several internet websites that have become very successful selling hand and power tools, Japanese Koi and Duppattas, which are Indian Scarfs

lender.name: FriendofFella
lender.loan_because: I so very much want the world to be a fairer place. And more selfishly, I loan because I believe that the only chance we have of ever having real peace on earth is if we strive together to eradicate poverty and inequity here, first.
lender.occupational_info:
And I want that real peace, as I want EVERY human being to have plentiful opportunities for a good life - and opportunities for real hope and for real joy - I want that more than I could ever say.
And so, most likely, would that fine-looking fella in the picture, were he not so utterly preoccupied with fetching sticks, chasing ducks, stalking squirrels, and trying to heft his 70 pound oversized self into my lap.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: My niece is very interesting and generous and gave me a gift of being able to give a Kiva loan. I was always really impressed with the micro loan.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I have a job in an office. I sit at a computer and make work with television stations and ad agencies to make sure that their advertisements play. I don't see the adds or the shows I put them in. It's rather boring and my friends and family don't really get what I'm doing. I like it. And it pays my rent. I've been a musician and traveled a lot doing that and I prefer this, being in one place near my friends and family. I love playing music but found traveling so much very stressful.

lender.name: Pamela
lender.loan_because: I can. And I love people's stories!
lender.occupational_info: I help people learn to save and use their money to take care of their families and accomplish their goals in life. I also love to read and travel.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping out someone less fortunate than I, and I'm very entreprenurial in spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I market and sell a product for my company. Our product involves recruiting participants who are interested in participating in surveys, specifically in surveys done over the Internet.

lender.name: Johannes
lender.loan_because: I am happy because money goes to real people. Foreign aid often buys foreign weapons to kill people. Who needs that? I wish other people success, and Kiva lets me put my money where my mouth is.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: To lift others up, as Jesus has lifted Me up.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: We are all in this together
lender.occupational_info: I work with companies to help them realize their full potential

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a business. I wish there had been a place like this for me when i needed working capital. Now that I am up and running I want to give something back to this world.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and build computers. I am a programmer and a network engineer.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
